info.author: Andy Altepeter / Bethel University
classifiers: Topic :: Software Development :: Libraries :: Python Modules
info.description:
Introduction for smitheme.bclear
================================

This package defines Bethel Universities custom theme for Silva 2.3's Silva
Management Interface.  This theme will not work for Silva 3.0+, and likely will
not work for 2.2 and lower.

This is a blue, airy theme giving more space around elements.  Some elements
are repositioned or removed/hidden. 

Breadcrumb Nav
--------------

The breadcrumb is now the primary means of navigation.  The up arrows next to
each tab have been removed, since our experience showed that authors didn't
know how to use them.  

Between each breadcrumb item is an arrow -- clicking the arrow will display
all of the tabs for the next item in the crumb.



smitheme.bclear Changelog
=========================

smitheme.bclear 1.0.8 (2012-03-23)
----------------------------------

- placed 'hide feedback' in a div floated right.

- added bottom margin on .info

- adjust styling for tinymce and textline widgets within zeam forms

1.0.7 (2011-11-15)
------------------

- fixed display of up arrow in the sidebar

1.0.6 (2011-10-19)
------------------

- fixed middleground button spacing issue

- renamed smi.css to bclear.css

1.0.5 (2011-10-11)
------------------

- merged ncolumn branch

1.0.4 (2011-09-11)
------------------

- adjusted styling of author comments on the publish tab

1.0.3 (2011-08-29)
------------------

- updated smi.css to fix some display issues

1.0.2 (2011-08-17)
------------------

- updated smi.css to fix some display issues

1.0.1 (2011-07-26)
------------------

- updated smi.css to fix some display funkyness

- adjust the preview frameset top height

1.0 (2011-07-07)
----------------

- Initial release
info.name: smitheme.bclear
info.html_description:
Introduction for smitheme.bclear

This package defines Bethel Universities custom theme for Silva 2.3’s Silva Management Interface. This theme will not work for Silva 3.0+, and likely will not work for 2.2 and lower.

This is a blue, airy theme giving more space around elements. Some elements are repositioned or removed/hidden.

Breadcrumb Nav

The breadcrumb is now the primary means of navigation. The up arrows next to each tab have been removed, since our experience showed that authors didn’t know how to use them.

Between each breadcrumb item is an arrow – clicking the arrow will display all of the tabs for the next item in the crumb.

smitheme.bclear Changelog

smitheme.bclear 1.0.8 (2012-03-23)

  • placed ‘hide feedback’ in a div floated right.
  • added bottom margin on .info
  • adjust styling for tinymce and textline widgets within zeam forms

1.0.7 (2011-11-15)

  • fixed display of up arrow in the sidebar

1.0.6 (2011-10-19)

  • fixed middleground button spacing issue
  • renamed smi.css to bclear.css

1.0.5 (2011-10-11)

  • merged ncolumn branch

1.0.4 (2011-09-11)

  • adjusted styling of author comments on the publish tab

1.0.3 (2011-08-29)

  • updated smi.css to fix some display issues

1.0.2 (2011-08-17)

  • updated smi.css to fix some display issues

1.0.1 (2011-07-26)

  • updated smi.css to fix some display funkyness
  • adjust the preview frameset top height

1.0 (2011-07-07)

  • Initial release
